about_the_game:
Gnome Expedition is a short but intense fantasy horror game where you must collect ingredients for your Gnome-Style Stew, while being chased by a demonic knight that is about 10x your size. You navigate through a maze-like map while you roam the dirt trenches in between the woods. Enter a world of retro, PS2 inspired graphics in a fantastical grand forest that progressively grows more haunted and gruesome.

Run
    Running is enhanced by sprinting, but sprint wisely, as you are limited with a stamina bar.
Power Ups
    Mushrooms: Collect mushrooms that significantly boost your stamina.
    Enchanted Rose: Each level has one rose, which can provide you 5 seconds of invincibility.
Power ups are stored in your inventory. Use them wisely to help evade difficult situations.

Maps
You will be given a map for each progressing variant of the forest. Use it to help you navigate to the end of the forest, which guarantee that you collect all the ingredients you need from your checklist. There are many tricks and turns in the woods; if you're lost, make sure to use the totem poles and other landmarks to help you find your way.

content_descriptors.notes: Light blood and depictions of fantasy corpses.

detailed_description:
Gnome Expedition is a short but intense fantasy horror game where you must collect ingredients for your Gnome-Style Stew, while being chased by a demonic knight that is about 10x your size. You navigate through a maze-like map while you roam the dirt trenches in between the woods. Enter a world of retro, PS2 inspired graphics in a fantastical grand forest that progressively grows more haunted and gruesome.

    Mushrooms: Collect mushrooms that significantly boost your stamina.
    Enchanted Rose: Each level has one rose, which can provide you 5 seconds of invincibility.
Power ups are stored in your inventory. Use them wisely to help evade difficult situations.

Maps
You will be given a map for each progressing variant of the forest. Use it to help you navigate to the end of the forest, which guarantee that you collect all the ingredients you need from your checklist. There are many tricks and turns in the woods; if you're lost, make sure to use the totem poles and other landmarks to help you find your way.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3250
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Gnome Expedition

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3250
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: A retro-style fantasy horror game where you must try to escape as a gnome from the giant demonic knight that hunts you down on your quest to collect ingredients.
